mapper.select: SELECT spec_kind, box_count, recept, collation, on_shelf, unpack FROM partial_bussiness_standard
mapper.update: REPLACE INTO partial_bussiness_standard ( spec_kind, box_count, recept, collation, on_shelf, unpack ) VALUES ( #{spec_kind}, #{box_count}, #{recept}, #{collation}, #{on_shelf}, #{unpack} )
mapper.select: SELECT spec_kind, box_count, recept, collation, on_shelf, unpack FROM partial_bussiness_standard WHERE spec_kind = #{spec_kind}
